I have been wearing Unequal chest protectors, shoulder pads, and thigh pads for much of the late and post-season-- resulting in pain-free playing,'' stated Michael Vick . The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. the realignment atop the company's Server and Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system.'' Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said,`` While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
